history.content:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################
Example 1: 
Entity_types: ORGANIZATION,EVENT,CHAPTER,ARTICLE,PAGE

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 운영규정

Title: Hansung University Computer Engineering Department Teaching Assistant Recruitment Announcement
Content:
Hello, this is the administrative assistant from the Department of Computer Engineering.
Currently, we are recruiting administrative and teaching assistants for the Department of Computer Engineering.

1. Recruitment Fields
- Administrative Assistant (Day shift) or Teaching Assistant (Day shift)
- Number of openings: 1 for each (select either Administrative or Teaching Assistant)

2. Qualifications
- Academic requirement: A bachelor's degree or higher
- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment
- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

3. Working Conditions
- 5 days a week, daytime
- Daytime: 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
- During vacation periods: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
- Expected start date: December 15, 2024
- Administrative Assistant: Hansung University Jiseong Building 105, IT Engineering Academic Team Office
- Teaching Assistant: Hansung University Engineering Building A 104, Department of Computer Engineering Office
- Contract: 1 year (renewable once for up to 2 years)

4. Documents to Submit
- Resume (use the attached format, include a photo)
- Submission deadline: November 29, Friday

5. Recruitment Process
- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)
- Additional documents for successful candidates: University graduation certificate, transcript, resident registration, etc. to be provided later.

######################

details.prompt: MANY entities and relationships were missed in the last extraction. Remember to ONLY emit entities that match any of the previously extracted types. Add them below using the same format:

history.content:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################
Example 1: 
Entity_types: ORGANIZATION,EVENT,CHAPTER,ARTICLE,PAGE
Text:
page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 총 칙

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 제 2 조 (명칭) 본 재단의 명칭은 가람교육재단이라 한다. 

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 운영규정

Text:
Title: Hansung University Computer Engineering Department Teaching Assistant Recruitment Announcement
Content:
Hello, this is the administrative assistant from the Department of Computer Engineering.
Currently, we are recruiting administrative and teaching assistants for the Department of Computer Engineering.

1. Recruitment Fields
- Administrative Assistant (Day shift) or Teaching Assistant (Day shift)
- Number of openings: 1 for each (select either Administrative or Teaching Assistant)

2. Qualifications
- Academic requirement: A bachelor's degree or higher
- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment
- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

3. Working Conditions
- 5 days a week, daytime
- Daytime: 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
- During vacation periods: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
- Expected start date: December 15, 2024
- Administrative Assistant: Hansung University Jiseong Building 105, IT Engineering Academic Team Office
- Teaching Assistant: Hansung University Engineering Building A 104, Department of Computer Engineering Office
- Contract: 1 year (renewable once for up to 2 years)

4. Documents to Submit
- Resume (use the attached format, include a photo)
- Submission deadline: November 29, Friday

5. Recruitment Process
- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)
- Additional documents for successful candidates: University graduation certificate, transcript, resident registration, etc. to be provided later.

######################

Text: 는 대학생들의 팀 프로젝트 활동을 지원해주는 웹 사이트이다.              |
|     | 메인 페이지에서 팀을 제목, 해쉬태그, 카테고리 등을 이용하여 쉽게 찾을 수 있다. 유저는 찾은  |
|     | 팀에 가입 신청을 할 수 있고, 이력서를 공개하여 가입 권유를 받을 수 있다. 유저는 가입된 팀의 |
|     | 팀스페이스에서 게시판을 이용할 수도 있고, 원격저장소(깃허브) 링크를 통해 원격저장소에 접근할 수 |
|     | 있다. 원격저장소 링크는 팀 원들에게 공개하고 싶은 커밋으로 링크를 통해 안내된다. 팀 내부에서  |
|     | 유저의 역할은 팀장과 팀원으로 분류되 는데, 팀장은 팀원을 관리할 수 있다.             |
|     | 주요 적용 기술 및 구조                                          |
|     | 데이터베이스 : MariaDB                                       |
|     | 프레임워크 : 부트스트랩, 리액트, 스프링부트 개발 환경 :                      |
|     | 인텔리제이, VisualStudio Code                               |
|     | 배포 환경 : AWS 버전                                         |
|     | 관리 : 깃허브                                               |
|     | 144                                                    |
|     | 한성대학교 컴퓨터공학부                                           |

page: 145
headline: cse-capstone2023
content: 지도교수 : 작품 소개 사진 기대효과 2023 캡스톤디자인 작품 발표회 웹 공 학 신성 Department of Computer Engineering 145 지금까지 대학교에서 조별과제나 캡스톤을 포함하여 다양한 팀 활동을 할 때, 에브리타임과 같은 커뮤니티를 이용하여 따로 글을 올려 모집해야 하는 불편함이 있었다. 따라서, 대학교의 팀 활동들 을 통합하여 관리해주 고 팀 활동을 지원해주는 투게더 웹사이트가 있으면 희망하는 팀을 찾아 프로 젝트 관리, 게시판 등 팀에 대한 다양한 지원 서비스를 이용할 수 있을 것이다. 이 찬 울 : 클라이언트, 디자인 및 UI 기능 구현, RestAPI 연동 양 정 우 : 클라이언트, 디자인 및 UI 기능 구현, 클라이언트 코드 최적화 정 찬 진 : 백 엔드, 기능 구현, 백엔드 DB 연동 및 데이터베이스 관리 이 익 재 : 백 엔드, AWS를 활용한 프로젝트 배포

history.content:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################

Title: Hansung University Computer Engineering Department Teaching Assistant Recruitment Announcement
Content:
Hello, this is the administrative assistant from the Department of Computer Engineering.
Currently, we are recruiting administrative and teaching assistants for the Department of Computer Engineering.

1. Recruitment Fields
- Administrative Assistant (Day shift) or Teaching Assistant (Day shift)
- Number of openings: 1 for each (select either Administrative or Teaching Assistant)

2. Qualifications
- Academic requirement: A bachelor's degree or higher
- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment
- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

3. Working Conditions
- 5 days a week, daytime
- Daytime: 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
- During vacation periods: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
- Expected start date: December 15, 2024
- Administrative Assistant: Hansung University Jiseong Building 105, IT Engineering Academic Team Office
- Teaching Assistant: Hansung University Engineering Building A 104, Department of Computer Engineering Office
- Contract: 1 year (renewable once for up to 2 years)

4. Documents to Submit
- Resume (use the attached format, include a photo)
- Submission deadline: November 29, Friday

5. Recruitment Process
- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)
- Additional documents for successful candidates: University graduation certificate, transcript, resident registration, etc. to be provided later.

details.prompt: MANY entities and relationships were missed in the last extraction. Remember to ONLY emit entities that match any of the previously extracted types. Add them below using the same format:

history.content:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################
Example 1: 
Entity_types: ORGANIZATION,EVENT,CHAPTER,ARTICLE,PAGE
Text:
page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 제 1 조 (설립목적) 본 재단은 교육기관의 설립 및 운영을 통해 공익에 이바지함을 목적으로 한다.

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 제 2 조 (명칭) 본 재단의 명칭은 가람교육재단이라 한다. 

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 운영규정
content: 제 1 조 (목적) 이 규정은 가람교육재단의 운영에 필요한 사항을 정함을 목적으로 한다.

Example 3:
Entity_types: ORGANIZATION,GEO,PERSON,EVENT,DATE,ROOM
Text:
Title: Hansung University Computer Engineering Department Teaching Assistant Recruitment Announcement
Content:
Hello, this is the administrative assistant from the Department of Computer Engineering.
Currently, we are recruiting administrative and teaching assistants for the Department of Computer Engineering.

1. Recruitment Fields
- Administrative Assistant (Day shift) or Teaching Assistant (Day shift)
- Number of openings: 1 for each (select either Administrative or Teaching Assistant)

2. Qualifications
- Academic requirement: A bachelor's degree or higher
- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment
- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

3. Working Conditions
- 5 days a week, daytime
- Daytime: 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
- During vacation periods: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
- Expected start date: December 15, 2024
- Administrative Assistant: Hansung University Jiseong Building 105, IT Engineering Academic Team Office
- Teaching Assistant: Hansung University Engineering Building A 104, Department of Computer Engineering Office
- Contract: 1 year (renewable once for up to 2 years)

4. Documents to Submit
- Resume (use the attached format, include a photo)
- Submission deadline: November 29, Friday

5. Recruitment Process
- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)
- Additional documents for successful candidates: University graduation certificate, transcript, resident registration, etc. to be provided later.

######################
Output:

details.prompt: MANY entities and relationships were missed in the last extraction. Remember to ONLY emit entities that match any of the previously extracted types. Add them below using the same format:

history.content:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################
Example 1: 
Entity_types: ORGANIZATION,EVENT,CHAPTER,ARTICLE,PAGE
Text:
page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 총 칙

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 제 1 조 (설립목적) 본 재단은 교육기관의 설립 및 운영을 통해 공익에 이바지함을 목적으로 한다.

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 제 2 조 (명칭) 본 재단의 명칭은 가람교육재단이라 한다. 

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 운영규정
content: 제 1 조 (목적) 이 규정은 가람교육재단의 운영에 필요한 사항을 정함을 목적으로 한다.

Text:
Title: Hansung University Computer Engineering Department Teaching Assistant Recruitment Announcement
Content:
Hello, this is the administrative assistant from the Department of Computer Engineering.
Currently, we are recruiting administrative and teaching assistants for the Department of Computer Engineering.

1. Recruitment Fields
- Administrative Assistant (Day shift) or Teaching Assistant (Day shift)
- Number of openings: 1 for each (select either Administrative or Teaching Assistant)

2. Qualifications
- Academic requirement: A bachelor's degree or higher
- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment
- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

3. Working Conditions
- 5 days a week, daytime
- Daytime: 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
- During vacation periods: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
- Expected start date: December 15, 2024
- Administrative Assistant: Hansung University Jiseong Building 105, IT Engineering Academic Team Office
- Teaching Assistant: Hansung University Engineering Building A 104, Department of Computer Engineering Office
- Contract: 1 year (renewable once for up to 2 years)

4. Documents to Submit
- Resume (use the attached format, include a photo)
- Submission deadline: November 29, Friday

5. Recruitment Process
- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)
- Additional documents for successful candidates: University graduation certificate, transcript, resident registration, etc. to be provided later.

######################

details.prompt: MANY entities and relationships were missed in the last extraction. Remember to ONLY emit entities that match any of the previously extracted types. Add them below using the same format:

history.content:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################
Example 1: 
Entity_types: ORGANIZATION,EVENT,CHAPTER,ARTICLE,PAGE
Text:
page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 총 칙

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 제 1 조 (설립목적) 본 재단은 교육기관의 설립 및 운영을 통해 공익에 이바지함을 목적으로 한다.

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 제 2 조 (명칭) 본 재단의 명칭은 가람교육재단이라 한다. 

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 운영규정
content: 제 1 조 (목적) 이 규정은 가람교육재단의 운영에 필요한 사항을 정함을 목적으로 한다.

######################

Title: Hansung University Computer Engineering Department Teaching Assistant Recruitment Announcement
Content:
Hello, this is the administrative assistant from the Department of Computer Engineering.
Currently, we are recruiting administrative and teaching assistants for the Department of Computer Engineering.

1. Recruitment Fields
- Administrative Assistant (Day shift) or Teaching Assistant (Day shift)
- Number of openings: 1 for each (select either Administrative or Teaching Assistant)

2. Qualifications
- Academic requirement: A bachelor's degree or higher
- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment
- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

3. Working Conditions
- 5 days a week, daytime
- Daytime: 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
- During vacation periods: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
- Expected start date: December 15, 2024
- Administrative Assistant: Hansung University Jiseong Building 105, IT Engineering Academic Team Office
- Teaching Assistant: Hansung University Engineering Building A 104, Department of Computer Engineering Office
- Contract: 1 year (renewable once for up to 2 years)

4. Documents to Submit
- Resume (use the attached format, include a photo)
- Submission deadline: November 29, Friday

5. Recruitment Process
- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)
- Additional documents for successful candidates: University graduation certificate, transcript, resident registration, etc. to be provided later.

history.content:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################

- Number of openings: 1 for each (select either Administrative or Teaching Assistant)

2. Qualifications
- Academic requirement: A bachelor's degree or higher
- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment
- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

3. Working Conditions

- During vacation periods: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
- Expected start date: December 15, 2024
- Administrative Assistant: Hansung University Jiseong Building 105, IT Engineering Academic Team Office
- Teaching Assistant: Hansung University Engineering Building A 104, Department of Computer Engineering Office
- Contract: 1 year (renewable once for up to 2 years)

- Resume (use the attached format, include a photo)
- Submission deadline: November 29, Friday

5. Recruitment Process
- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)
- Additional documents for successful candidates: University graduation certificate, transcript, resident registration, etc. to be provided later.

history.content:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

Title: Hansung University Computer Engineering Department Teaching Assistant Recruitment Announcement
Content:
Hello, this is the administrative assistant from the Department of Computer Engineering.
Currently, we are recruiting administrative and teaching assistants for the Department of Computer Engineering.

1. Recruitment Fields
- Administrative Assistant (Day shift) or Teaching Assistant (Day shift)
- Number of openings: 1 for each (select either Administrative or Teaching Assistant)

2. Qualifications
- Academic requirement: A bachelor's degree or higher
- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment
- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

3. Working Conditions
- 5 days a week, daytime
- Daytime: 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
- During vacation periods: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
- Expected start date: December 15, 2024
- Administrative Assistant: Hansung University Jiseong Building 105, IT Engineering Academic Team Office
- Teaching Assistant: Hansung University Engineering Building A 104, Department of Computer Engineering Office
- Contract: 1 year (renewable once for up to 2 years)

4. Documents to Submit
- Resume (use the attached format, include a photo)
- Submission deadline: November 29, Friday

5. Recruitment Process
- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)
- Additional documents for successful candidates: University graduation certificate, transcript, resident registration, etc. to be provided later.

Text: 진행할 수 있었습니다. 그 리고 이번 프로젝트를 통해서 하나가 아닌 여럿이 힘을 합쳐 성과를 이뤄낸 점에서 협 업의 중요성을 느꼈고, 다양한 개발 환경에 대해서도 접할 수 있었습니다. 마지막으로 매번 좋은 말씀 해주시고 다양한 경험을 할 수 있게 레퍼런스를 제공해 주셔서 조세홍 교수님께 감사의 말씀을 전하고 싶습니다. No. 16 - J100% 이 프로젝트는 실제로 불편함을 느끼고 이 를 해결하기 위하여 시작한 프로젝트이다. 지금까지 살면서 겪은 많은 약속 중 만 족도가 높았던 약속은 일정 계획이 깔끔하게 짜고 실행한 약속임을 착안하여 가벼운 약속도 여행처럼 일정을 미리 짜면 어떨 까 싶어 시작하게 되었다. 일정 짜기가 주 목적이지만 약속이라는 특성상 여러 사람과 함께할 수 있고 장소 이동 등을 하기 때문에 이와 적합한 부가기능을 추가하였고 새로운 장소에 대해 일정을 짜기를 쉽게 하기 위해 검색 기능을 추가하였다. 완 벽하지는 않지만 이 앱을 통해 많은 사람이 도움을 받게 하는 것이 최종 목표이다. No. 17 - 포도봉봉 처음 생각한 방향과는 다르게 저희의 실력에 따라서 타협을 하게되어 작게는 기능부터 크게는 주제의 방향성까지 수정이 많 이 있었습니다 . 하지만 프로젝트를 진행하면서 사용자의 입장과 지금까지 배웠던 것을 종합하여 프로젝트를 진행하였고, 다양한 배경과 경험을 가진 팀원들과 함께 일하면서 새로운 시각과 아이디어를 얻을 수 있었고, 서로의 장점을 살려 프로젝트를 완성해나갈 수 있었습니다 . 또 한 프로젝트를 통해 학교에서 배운 지식외에 다양한 라이브러리와 AWS 그리고 DB, 서버 그리고 통신방법 에 대해서 더욱 깊게 배울 수 있었습니다. No. 12 - 오이마켓 - 김상원 : 팀원들과 협업하여 작업하는 과정에서 많은 점을 배울 수 있는 시간이었다. - 가순원 : 팀 프로젝트였기에 마주할 수 있는 이런저런 어려움을 해결해나가며 성장할 계기가 되어 보람찼습니다. - 정재훈 : 팀 활동을 통해 같이 일하는 것에 대해 많이 배우게 되었고, 좀 더 팀에 도움이 되기 위해 공부하였습니다. 앞으로도 계속해서 노력해나가고자 합니다. - 김재영 : 처 음 벡앤드를 담당하게 되어 큰 도전이었지만, 팀원들의 많은 도움을 받으며 프로젝트를 완수하게 되어 큰 성취 감과 자신감을 얻었습니다.

history.content:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################

Content:
Hello, this is the administrative assistant from the Department of Computer Engineering.
Currently, we are recruiting administrative and teaching assistants for the Department of Computer Engineering.

1. Recruitment Fields
- Administrative Assistant (Day shift) or Teaching Assistant (Day shift)
- Number of openings: 1 for each (select either Administrative or Teaching Assistant)

2. Qualifications
- Academic requirement: A bachelor's degree or higher
- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment
- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

3. Working Conditions
- 5 days a week, daytime
- Daytime: 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
- During vacation periods: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
- Expected start date: December 15, 2024
- Administrative Assistant: Hansung University Jiseong Building 105, IT Engineering Academic Team Office
- Teaching Assistant: Hansung University Engineering Building A 104, Department of Computer Engineering Office
- Contract: 1 year (renewable once for up to 2 years)

4. Documents to Submit
- Resume (use the attached format, include a photo)
- Submission deadline: November 29, Friday

5. Recruitment Process
- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)
- Additional documents for successful candidates: University graduation certificate, transcript, resident registration, etc. to be provided later.

history.content:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################
Example 1: 
Entity_types: ORGANIZATION,EVENT,CHAPTER,ARTICLE,PAGE
Text:
page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 총 칙

content: 제 1 장 제 2 조 (명칭) 본 재단의 명칭은 가람교육재단이라 한다.

headline: 가람교육재단 운영규정
content: 제 1 조 (목적) 이 규정은 가람교육재단의 운영에 필요한 사항을 정함을 목적으로 한다.

######################

Text:
Title: Hansung University Computer Engineering Department Teaching Assistant Recruitment Announcement
Content:
Hello, this is the administrative assistant from the Department of Computer Engineering.
Currently, we are recruiting administrative and teaching assistants for the Department of Computer Engineering.

1. Recruitment Fields
- Administrative Assistant (Day shift) or Teaching Assistant (Day shift)
- Number of openings: 1 for each (select either Administrative or Teaching Assistant)

2. Qualifications
- Academic requirement: A bachelor's degree or higher
- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment
- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

3. Working Conditions
- 5 days a week, daytime
- Daytime: 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
- During vacation periods: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
- Expected start date: December 15, 2024
- Administrative Assistant: Hansung University Jiseong Building 105, IT Engineering Academic Team Office
- Teaching Assistant: Hansung University Engineering Building A 104, Department of Computer Engineering Office
- Contract: 1 year (renewable once for up to 2 years)

4. Documents to Submit
- Resume (use the attached format, include a photo)
- Submission deadline: November 29, Friday

5. Recruitment Process
- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)
- Additional documents for successful candidates: University graduation certificate, transcript, resident registration, etc. to be provided later.

######################

history.content:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################

- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)

content: ② 교외장학금 - 외부장학금 장 학 명 대상 장학금액 지급기간 및 선정기준 선정주체 보훈장학금 보훈대상자 직계 비속 입학금, 수업료 50% (국고보조포함) 등록 8학기 국가보훈처 관계 법령 북한이탈학생 지원장학금 관련 국가기관에서 발행하는 증명서를 제출 하고 해당 국가기관에서 요구하는 자격요건을 갖춘 자 입학금, 수업료 50% 등록 8학기 북한이탈주민의 보호 및 정착지원에 관한 법률 남당(이석주교수) 장학금 한국어문학부 재학중인 자로 학업성적이 우수 하고 품행이 방정한 자 일정금액 해당학기 해당학과에서 추천 의뢰한 자 한성비즈니스포럼 장학금 경영대학원 부설장학으로 학업성적이 우수하고 품행이 방정한 자 일정금액 해당학기 해당학과에서 추천 의뢰한 자 동문회장학금 동문장학으로 학업성적이 우수하고 품행이 방정한자 일정금액 해당학기 동문회에서추천 의뢰한자 기타 교외장학금 각 장학재단에서 추천 의뢰한 자중 조건에 적합한 자 일정금액 해당학기 해당 장학재단에서 추천 의뢰한 자 GKS(정부초청외국 인장학생)장학금 (2024.1.25.) 정부초청외국인장학생으로 선발되어 최종 입 학한 자 수업료, 생활비 일정금액 -등록 8학기 -지급시기 및 기준은 교외기관이 정한 바에 따름 해당기관에서 추천 의뢰한 자 6. 비교과장학금 장 학 명 대상 장학금액 학기구분 선정절차 관부서에서 추천한 자 기숙사 장학금 (2024.10.18.) - 기숙사 자치활동 참여 입사자- 비직영 및 임차 기숙사 입사자 일정액 해당학기 관련서류 제출 장학명 대 상 장학금액 지급기간 및 선정기준 한성도전장학금 -비교과장학금 7학기차 이내의 내국인 재학생 생활비성 장학금 최우수 300만원, 우수 100만원 지급 학기단위로 취득 비교과포인트와 가산점을 합산하여 전공계열별 고득점순으로 선정

history.content:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################
Example 1: 
Entity_types: ORGANIZATION,EVENT,CHAPTER,ARTICLE,PAGE
Text:
page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 총 칙

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 제 1 조 (설립목적) 본 재단은 교육기관의 설립 및 운영을 통해 공익에 이바지함을 목적으로 한다.

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 제 2 조 (명칭) 본 재단의 명칭은 가람교육재단이라 한다. 

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 운영규정
content: 제 1 조 (목적) 이 규정은 가람교육재단의 운영에 필요한 사항을 정함을 목적으로 한다.

######################
Output:
("entity"<|>가람교육재단<|>ORGANIZATION<|>교육기관의 설립 및 운영을 통해 공익에 이바지하는 재단)

##

Text:
Title: Hansung University Computer Engineering Department Teaching Assistant Recruitment Announcement
Content:
Hello, this is the administrative assistant from the Department of Computer Engineering.
Currently, we are recruiting administrative and teaching assistants for the Department of Computer Engineering.

1. Recruitment Fields
- Administrative Assistant (Day shift) or Teaching Assistant (Day shift)
- Number of openings: 1 for each (select either Administrative or Teaching Assistant)

2. Qualifications
- Academic requirement: A bachelor's degree or higher
- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment
- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

3. Working Conditions
- 5 days a week, daytime
- Daytime: 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
- During vacation periods: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
- Expected start date: December 15, 2024
- Administrative Assistant: Hansung University Jiseong Building 105, IT Engineering Academic Team Office
- Teaching Assistant: Hansung University Engineering Building A 104, Department of Computer Engineering Office
- Contract: 1 year (renewable once for up to 2 years)

4. Documents to Submit
- Resume (use the attached format, include a photo)
- Submission deadline: November 29, Friday

5. Recruitment Process
- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)
- Additional documents for successful candidates: University graduation certificate, transcript, resident registration, etc. to be provided later.

######################

headline: cse-capstone2023
content: 156 한성대학교 컴퓨터공학부 No. 33 - OingTT 캡스톤디자인을 완료하고 나서 느낀 가장 큰 점은 협업의 중요성이라고 생각합니다. 프로젝트를 수행하면서 팀원들과의 의사소통과 협력이 원활하게 이루어지지 않으면 프로젝트 진행에 많은 어려움이 따르게 됩니다. 따라서, 팀원들과의 의견 조율과 역할 분담, 일정 계획 등을 체계적으로 수립하고 그 계획을 성실하게 이행하는 것이 중요하다는 것을 느꼈습니다. 이번 프로젝트를 통해 여러 가지 기술과 프로그래밍 언어 등을 경험해보는 좋은 기회였습니다. 실제로 사용되는 기술을 직접 적용하고 개선해나가는 과정에서 많은 것을 배우고 성장할 수 있었습니다. 1학기라는 짧지만 긴 기간 동안, 팀원 모두가 각자의 학업과 함께 열심히 노력하여 개발한 만큼 팀원 각자에게 좋은 경험으 로 남게 될 것 같습니다. 그동안 함께 프로젝트를 만들어내 간
######################

history.content:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################

- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment

- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)

history.content:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################
Example 1: 
Entity_types: ORGANIZATION,EVENT,CHAPTER,ARTICLE,PAGE
Text:
page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 총 칙

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 제 1 조 (설립목적) 본 재단은 교육기관의 설립 및 운영을 통해 공익에 이바지함을 목적으로 한다.

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 제 2 조 (명칭) 본 재단의 명칭은 가람교육재단이라 한다. 

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 운영규정
content: 제 1 조 (목적) 이 규정은 가람교육재단의 운영에 필요한 사항을 정함을 목적으로 한다.

######################
Output:
("entity"<|>가람교육재단<|>ORGANIZATION<|>교육기관의 설립 및 운영을 통해 공익에 이바지하는 재단)
##
("entity"<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 1 장<|>CHAPTER<|>제 1 장 총칙: 가람교육재단 정관의 첫 번째 장으로, 설립목적과 명칭에 관한 내용을 포함함. 이 내용은 가림교육재단 정관 문서에서 추출함. 1페이지에 위치함.)
##
("entity"<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 1 조<|>ARTICLE<|>제 1 조 설립목적: 본 재단은 교육기관의 설립 및 운영을 통해 공익에 이바지함을 목적으로 한다. 이 내용은 가림교육재단 정관 문서에서 추출함. 1페이지에 위치함.)
##
("entity"<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 2 조<|>ARTICLE<|>제 2 조 명칭: 본 재단의 명칭은 가람교육재단이라 한다. 이 내용은 가림교육재단 정관 문서에서 추출함. 1페이지에 위치함.)
##
("entity"<|>가람교육재단 운영규정 제 1 조<|>ARTICLE<|>제 1 조 목적: 이 규정은 가람교육재단의 운영에 필요한 사항을 정함을 목적으로 한다. 이 내용은 가람교육재단 운영규정 문서에서 추출함. 1페이지에 위치함.)
##
("entity"<|>페이지 1<|>PAGE<|>가람교육재단 정관 문서의 1페이지에는 제 1 장 총칙과 제 1 조 설립목적, 제 2 조 명칭이 포함되어 있음. 가람교육재단 운영규정의 1페이지에는 제 1 조 목적이 포함되어 있음.)
##
("relationship"<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 1 조<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 1 장<|>제 1 조는 제 1 장 총칙에 포함되어 있음<|>10)
##
("relationship"<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 2 조<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 1 장<|>제 2 조는 제 1 장 총칙에 포함되어 있음<|>10)
##

##
("relationship"<|>가람교육재단<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 2 조<|>재단의 명칭은 가람교육재단임<|>9)
##

##

##

##

Example 3:

Text:
Title: Hansung University Computer Engineering Department Teaching Assistant Recruitment Announcement
Content:
Hello, this is the administrative assistant from the Department of Computer Engineering.
Currently, we are recruiting administrative and teaching assistants for the Department of Computer Engineering.

1. Recruitment Fields
- Administrative Assistant (Day shift) or Teaching Assistant (Day shift)
- Number of openings: 1 for each (select either Administrative or Teaching Assistant)

2. Qualifications
- Academic requirement: A bachelor's degree or higher
- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment
- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

3. Working Conditions
- 5 days a week, daytime
- Daytime: 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
- During vacation periods: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
- Expected start date: December 15, 2024
- Administrative Assistant: Hansung University Jiseong Building 105, IT Engineering Academic Team Office
- Teaching Assistant: Hansung University Engineering Building A 104, Department of Computer Engineering Office
- Contract: 1 year (renewable once for up to 2 years)

4. Documents to Submit
- Resume (use the attached format, include a photo)
- Submission deadline: November 29, Friday

5. Recruitment Process
- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)
- Additional documents for successful candidates: University graduation certificate, transcript, resident registration, etc. to be provided later.

######################
Output:
(“entity”<|>Hansung University<|>organization<|>컴퓨터공학부에서 행정 및 조교를 모집하는 한성대학교)

content: 8) 창업 R&D보고서 작성 ○ 창업지원센터에서 요청하는 R&D보고서 작성 (2021.10.21.) - 정부의 창업정책 분석, 우리대학의 대응방안 제안 - 특화프로그램, 창업관련 제도 도입 등 제안 ※ 학교에 제안하고자 하는 보고서 작성 시, 창업지원단 승인 후 작성 ○ 공동연구에 따른 R&D보고서 작성 시, 본교 인정환산율을 적용함 ○ 창업 R&D보고서 평가는 창업지원단에서 실시 ○ 창업지원센터 인정기준 (2021.10.21.) 9) 유관기관 연계 창업프로그램 운영 ○ 지역의 다양한 혁신주체(테크노파크(TP), 창조경제혁신센터 등) 및 창업지원기관과의 공동프로그램 운영 - 공동 주관기관으로 한성대학교가 포함되는 프로그램에 한함 (참여기관, 협력기관도 포함) ○ 창업지원센터 인정기준 (2021.10.21.) 10) 창업유관기관 협약 체결 ○ 협업기관과의 창업지원 협약 체결 건수 ○ 총장 �

history.content:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################

Title: Hansung University Computer Engineering Department Teaching Assistant Recruitment Announcement
Content:
Hello, this is the administrative assistant from the Department of Computer Engineering.
Currently, we are recruiting administrative and teaching assistants for the Department of Computer Engineering.

1. Recruitment Fields
- Administrative Assistant (Day shift) or Teaching Assistant (Day shift)
- Number of openings: 1 for each (select either Administrative or Teaching Assistant)

2. Qualifications
- Academic requirement: A bachelor's degree or higher
- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment
- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

3. Working Conditions
- 5 days a week, daytime
- Daytime: 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
- During vacation periods: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
- Expected start date: December 15, 2024
- Administrative Assistant: Hansung University Jiseong Building 105, IT Engineering Academic Team Office
- Teaching Assistant: Hansung University Engineering Building A 104, Department of Computer Engineering Office
- Contract: 1 year (renewable once for up to 2 years)

4. Documents to Submit
- Resume (use the attached format, include a photo)

-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

Title: Hansung University Computer Engineering Department Teaching Assistant Recruitment Announcement
Content:
Hello, this is the administrative assistant from the Department of Computer Engineering.
Currently, we are recruiting administrative and teaching assistants for the Department of Computer Engineering.

1. Recruitment Fields
- Administrative Assistant (Day shift) or Teaching Assistant (Day shift)
- Number of openings: 1 for each (select either Administrative or Teaching Assistant)

2. Qualifications
- Academic requirement: A bachelor's degree or higher
- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment
- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

3. Working Conditions
- 5 days a week, daytime
- Daytime: 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
- During vacation periods: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
- Expected start date: December 15, 2024
- Administrative Assistant: Hansung University Jiseong Building 105, IT Engineering Academic Team Office
- Teaching Assistant: Hansung University Engineering Building A 104, Department of Computer Engineering Office
- Contract: 1 year (renewable once for up to 2 years)

4. Documents to Submit
- Resume (use the attached format, include a photo)
- Submission deadline: November 29, Friday

5. Recruitment Process
- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)
- Additional documents for successful candidates: University graduation certificate, transcript, resident registration, etc. to be provided later.

history.content:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################

content: 제 1 장 제 2 조 (명칭) 본 재단의 명칭은 가람교육재단이라 한다.

Title: Hansung University Computer Engineering Department Teaching Assistant Recruitment Announcement
Content:
Hello, this is the administrative assistant from the Department of Computer Engineering.
Currently, we are recruiting administrative and teaching assistants for the Department of Computer Engineering.

1. Recruitment Fields
- Administrative Assistant (Day shift) or Teaching Assistant (Day shift)
- Number of openings: 1 for each (select either Administrative or Teaching Assistant)

2. Qualifications
- Academic requirement: A bachelor's degree or higher
- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment
- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

3. Working Conditions
- 5 days a week, daytime
- Daytime: 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
- During vacation periods: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
- Expected start date: December 15, 2024
- Administrative Assistant: Hansung University Jiseong Building 105, IT Engineering Academic Team Office
- Teaching Assistant: Hansung University Engineering Building A 104, Department of Computer Engineering Office
- Contract: 1 year (renewable once for up to 2 years)

4. Documents to Submit
- Resume (use the attached format, include a photo)
- Submission deadline: November 29, Friday

5. Recruitment Process
- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)
- Additional documents for successful candidates: University graduation certificate, transcript, resident registration, etc. to be provided later.

| 작품 소개 사진                                                         |     |     |         |     |     |
| 기대효과                                                             |     |     |         |     |     |
| 1) 교통사고율 감소에 기여                                                  |     |     |         |     |     |
| 자율주행 자동차는 안전성 향상을 향한 대책으로 사고요인 중 가장 큰 비율을 차지하는 인적 발견 미숙 이나 전방    |     |     |         |     |     |
| 정보 부족 등에 기인하는 교통사고의 감소를 기대할 수 있다.                                |     |     |         |     |     |
| 2) 운전 피로도 감소, 운전의 쾌적성 향상                                         |     |     |         |     |     |
| 자율주행차가 실현되면 운전부하를 큰 폭으로 경감하고, 장거리의 이동에서도 피로를 최소화한 상태로 이 동할 것으로   |     |     |         |     |     |
| 기대된다.                                                            |     |     |         |     |     |
| 3) 고령자의 이동 지원                                                    |     |     |         |     |     |
| 운전 중 교통사고 사망자수에 고령자 비율이 증가하고 있어 ‘고령자 특유의 실수’도 표면화되고 있다. 자 율주행 자동 |     |     |         |     |     |
| 차는 운전부하를 큰 폭으로 줄여주기 때문에 고령자의 교통문제 해결이 가능해 ‘고령자 이동’을 지원할 수 있다.    |     |     |         |     |     |

page: 60
headline: cse-capstone2023
content: 작품개요 주요 적용 기술 및 구조 바른흡연 60 한성대학교 컴퓨터공학부 주요기술 : OpenCV, YOLOv8, YOLOv5, OpenPose, SORT 라이브러리 : Flask, Direction API, CUDA, Firebase 개발환경 : VS Code, Xcode, AWS(EC2, RDS), goormIDE(GPU server), MySQL 개발언어 : Python, Swift H / W : Raspberry Pi 다모임 흡연자 검출 모델을 활용한, 단속반 & 미화원 경로추천 서비스 담배꽁초로 인한 배수구 막힘, 지정 외 구역 흡연으로 인한 간접흡연 등 담배로 인한 사회적 문제는 현대사회에 고착화된 문제이다. 이로 인해, 관련 종사자들의 업무는 점차 가중되고 있다. 프로젝트 “바른흡연”은, 이러한 업무 부담을 해소하는데 목적을 둔다. 흡연자의 행위패턴을 분석하여 딥러닝 기술(Yolov8, OpenPose)을 앙상블 기법으로 융합한 흡연자 검출 모델을 만들었다. CCTV 영상에서 검출한 흡연자 수 데이터를 유저에게 히트맵, 파라미터 기반 경로추천, 시간별 검출 통계 방식으로 제공한다. 이를 통해, ‘단속반 & 미화원’에게 효율적인 업무 동선을 제공한다.
